name: The Blue Pinguin
description:
The Blue Pinguin

The blue pinguin is stuck in the factory. Help him escape the factory by collecting all six stars. 

What is it?

This is a small 2D platformer with only two levels. You can use jump or throw snowballs to overcome obstacles. But watch out, you only have 300 seconds for every level and not more than 3 lifes each level.

Keys

Q or A - Move Left
D - Move Right
Space - Jump
Mouseclick - throw snowball
Control + M - Toggle Music off/on
Escape - Close game
